prodNameC: “西門子” 極敏甲狀腺刺激素3試劑組
ingredientsDesc:
•	ReadyPack includes :
(1) Lite Reagent 6.0 ml containing bovine serum albumin conjugated to monoclonal ati-TSH labeled with acridinium ester in HEPES buffered saline, mouse IgG, BSA, goat serum, surfactant and preservatives.
(2) Solid Phase 21.0 ml containing anti-fluorescein monoclonal antibody covalently linked to paramagnetic particles (PMP) (~85 μg/ml) in HEPES buffered saline, BSA, goat serum, surfactant, and preservatives.
(3) Ancillary Reagent 6.0 ml containing FITC conjugated to monoclonal anti-TSH (~3 μg/ml) in HEPES buffered saline, BSA, goat serum, surfactant, and preservatives. 
(4) Calibrator vials 2.0 ml/vial containing low and high levels of TSH in HEPES buffered equine serum with sodium azide (<0.1%) and preservatives.
applicantName: 西門子醫療設備股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台北市南港區園區街3號2樓之2
efficacy: 體外診斷使用，使用於ADVIA Centaur與ADVIA Centaur XP系統上定量測試血清、肝素化血漿、與EDTA血漿之甲狀腺刺激素。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: A 臨床化學及臨床毒理學
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: A.1690 甲狀腺剌激荷爾蒙試驗系統
